mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student_homework( id, title, classes_id, makedate, teacher, course_id, other, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{classesId}, #{makedate}, #{teacher}, #{courseId}, #{other}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
